boardgame.name: IKI
boardgame.description: Japanese style board game: Master the art of trade on the streets of ancient Japan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;IKI is a medium weight strategy game for 2-4 players, ages 13+, with a playing time of 60-90 minutes. It bases itself in the city of Edo, or what we now know today as Tokyo, Japan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Edo was a thriving city with an estimated population of one million, half townspeople and half samurai. With a huge shopping culture, Edo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s main district, Nihonbashi, was lined with shops, selling kimonos, rice, and so much more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Nihonbashi will be the focus of this game. IKI: A Game of EDO Artisans will bring you on a journey through the famed street of old Tokyo. Hear the voices of Nihonbashi Bridge_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s great fish market. Meet the professionals, classing from 700_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;-800 different jobs. Enter the interactivity of the shoppers and vendors. Become one with the townspeople._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One of the main professions in the world of Edo is the artisan. Each of the Edo artisans use their own skill of trade to support the townspeople_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s lives. In this game, not only are there artisans, but street vendors, sellers at the shops, and professions unique to this time and age. Meet the puppet masters, putting on a show. Meet the ear cleaners that people would line up for. This game just got a whole lot more exciting._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The goal of this game is to become the annual Edoite, best personifying what is known as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;IKI._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; What is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;IKI,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; you ask? _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;IKI_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; is an ancient philosophy, believed to be the ideal way of living among people in Edo. Knowing the subtleties of human nature, being refined and attractive... These are all elements of a true IKI master._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Ep 9 - Above _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Below, Tzolk_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;in, Iki, Ice Cool, Junk Art

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
